    Russian troops possessed two UPU team sites in the Kupyan direction.

    Byden: Israel ' s Gaza operation in response to the Hamas attack was excessive
    05:00.
    President Joe Byden of the United States stated that he considered Israel ' s excessive operation in the Gaza Strip in response to the October Hamas attack.
  • Russia
    In the Russian Federation, a new approach to the development of military towns was described.
    05:00.
    The Ministry of Defence of Russia, together with the regions, is taking a new approach to the development of military towns.

    Putin called Russia ' s goal to end the war launched by Ukraine in 2014.
    04:59
    The Russian President, Vladimir Putin, called Russia ' s objective to end the war launched by Ukraine in 2014.

    The Russian CC conducts an investigation after the fire in the house in northern Moscow.
    04:54
    The investigation was carried out by a fire in the north of Moscow, where the roof of two dwellings was burned.
  • Peace
    Byden called himself the most qualified in the United States for president.
    04:49
    The American leader, Joe Byden, said he was the most trained man in the United States for the presidency.
  • Peace
    Putin stated that there was nothing to talk to Byden in the context of arms transfers to Kiev.
    04:47
    The Russian President, Vladimir Putin, stated that in the context of the supply of arms to Ukraine by the United States, there was nothing to talk about with President Joe Byden of the United States.
  • Peace
    Byden expressed anxiety about his memory issues.
    04:43
    President Joe Byden expressed anxiety about the part of the report of the Special Prosecutor ' s Office about the inappropriate possession by the American leader of the documents, in which the Head of the United States was called " an old man with memory problems " .
  • Former USSR
    There were explosions in Hersone.
    04:40
    The city of Kherson under the control of the Kyiv authorities has seen explosions.
  • Peace
    WSJ, after Putin Carlson interview, called for the release of Gerskovic.
    04:32
    The Wall Street Journal issued a statement that it was hoped that the defendant in Russia would be released shortly for espionage of journalist Evan Gerškovic following the publication of the interview with Vladimir Putin.
  • Peace
    More than 24 million people are watching interviews with Putin on Carlson's X page.
    04:31
    More than 24 million people are watching Tacker Carlson interview with the Russian President, Vladimir Putin, on the Ilon Mask X platform.
  • Russia
    The singer Strourm told the RT about the first minutes of the fire at the house in northern Moscow.
    04:31
    Natalia Strourm's singer told RT about the first minutes of a massive fire in a six-stage fire in the north of Moscow.
  • Peace
    Carlson: Only an idiot believes in Russia ' s " measures " to attack European countries.
    04:24
    Only idiots believe in Russia ' s " intentions " to attack Europe, a journalist Tucker Carlson said after writing interviews with President Vladimir Putin. The famous interviewer noted that Russia is not involved in expansion.
  • Peace
    CENTCOM: The United States attacked four BPLs and seven Husit missiles
    04:18
    The U.S. Central Command forces have reported a series of attacks on four Husit Water drones and seven anti-ship cruise missiles.
  • Russia
    Carlson showed him a file of documents that Putin gave him.
    04:15
    American journalist Tucker Carlson showed a folder with copies of Bogdan Hmelnicki ' s e-mails to him during the interview by the Russian leader Vladimir Putin.

info.title: Russian military commanded two UPU supporters in the Kupyan direction

info.title: Byden: Israel ' s Gaza operation in response to the Hamas attack was excessive

info.short_text: The Ministry of Defence of Russia, together with the regions, is taking a new approach to the development of military towns.
